General.Name: Cyclacel Pharmaceuticals Inc
General.Description: Cyclacel Pharmaceuticals, Inc., a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company, develops cancer medicines based on cell cycle, transcriptional regulation, epigenetics, and mitosis control biology in the United States. Its lead product Plogosertib or plogo, a solid tumors and hematological malignancies, which is in Phase 1/2 clinical trial. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
